  • Reference

Calculate the Transient Impression after an Event

Source: R/transient_impression.R
transient_impression.Rd

Calculate the Transient Impression after an Event

transient_impression(act, beh, obj, dictionary = "us")

Arguments

beh

lowercase string corresponding to the behavior term
dictionary

which dictionary to use, currently set to "us"
actor

lowercase string corresponding to the actor identity
object

lowercase string corresponding to the object identity

Value

dataframe in long format, with one row for each element-dimension of the event, columns for fundamental sentiment and transient impression.

Examples

transient_impression("ceo", "advise", "benefactor")

#>         term element dimension fundamental_sentiment trans_imp
#> 1        ceo       A         E                  0.71  1.512329
#> 2        ceo       A         P                  3.22  2.377649
#> 3        ceo       A         A                  1.48  1.024836
#> 4     advise       B         E                  2.57  1.600150
#> 5     advise       B         P                  2.28  2.086134
#> 6     advise       B         A                  0.28  0.612600
#> 7 benefactor       O         E                  1.97  1.499909
#> 8 benefactor       O         P                  1.98  1.076825
#> 9 benefactor       O         A                  0.10  0.097500
